name: PokéTrainer GO! - XP, Leveling
description:
From the makers of Skins Pro Creator for Minecraft comes the ultimate Pokemon GO Trainer app. This app comes packed full of all the info you need to become a Pokémon Master!

Features Include:  
- Full list of all moves
- Full list of all XP types
- Full list of all levels, XP, rewards, and more!
- Move details
- FREE download!
 - Universal app with custom design for iPhone/iPod Touch

Download the BEST Pokémon Trainer app on iOS today!

Seejaykay apps and websites are family friendly.

This app and Seejaykay LLC are not affiliated with Nintendo, The Pokemon Company, Game FREAK, or Niantic Labs. Niantic Labs is the legal creator of Pokemon GO. All graphical assets of Pokemon and its trademark are owned by The Pokemon Company.
